name: filmmaking

the process or art of making a film: The film took the Jury Prize in Short Filmmaking at the recent Sundance Film Festival. She is pursuing a filmmaking career. See
filmmaker
More examplesFewer examplesThe finest filmmaking is also the simplest.Their approach to filmmaking is collective.Filmmaking is a matter of trying to find performances that you believe in and creating images that have emotional power.
